headline: Regency Centers Elects Mark J. Parrell to Board of Directors
summary: JACKSONVILLE, Fla., Dec. 16, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Regency Centers Corporation (“Regency Centers” or “Regency”) (Nasdaq: REG) today announced the election of Mark J. Parrell to its Board of Directors (the “Board”), effective January 1, 2026. With the addition of Mr. Parrell as an independent director, Regency will expand the size of its Board to twelve directors. “We are delighted to welcome Mark to our Board,” said Martin E. “Hap” Stein, Jr., Executive Chair of Regency Centers. “His proven l
